{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-05T17:31:11.000Z", "description": "Role: Infra DevOps engineer
Location: Morrisville, NC (remote till covid)
Mode: Contract

Detailed Job description:
\u2022\tMinimum 5 years as an Infrastructure DevOps or automation engineer
\u2022\tProficient in server side scripting
\u2022\tKnowledge of DevOps capabilities such as Continuous Integration and Delivery (CI/CD), Automated Testing, etc.
\u2022\tKnowledge on Terraform is must preferably in Azure
\u2022\tGood exposure on Micro services architecture and their deployment in cloud world. (Especially Azure +Terraform)
\u2022\tShould have worked on setting up & troubleshooting Kubernetes Clusters in Production ready environment
\u2022\tHelp teams in migration from monolithic application to Micro services using containerization solutions (Docker, Kubernetes)
\u2022\tWorked on onboarding Micro services (Middleware/UI) components using DevOps technique & look for improvements
\u2022\tPrior experience in automating CI/CD process, platform services using open source tools
